bindings.name: post
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT p.name, p.name_en, p.category, p.linkedin_url, p.linkedin_url_en, p.category_en, p.created, p.url, p.url_en, p.cover, p.id, p.content, p.content_en, p.description, p.description_en, p.audio_mp3_es, p.audio_mp3_en, p.audio_ogg_es, p.audio_ogg_en, p.user FROM p WHERE p.url = {url} OR p.url_en = {url} AND p.published = true
